text.config.mediachat.title: MediaChat Options
text.config.mediachat.option.maxRamUsage: upper limit of RAM used by media elements in mb
text.config.mediachat.option.mediaChatHe: Determines how many chat lines an image takes up
Should media elements be saved to disk.
Useful if you use mods that restore Chat history.
text.config.mediachat.option.maxCacheSiz:
If the max cache size is exceeded,
the oldest saved media element is deleted
text.config.mediachat.option.displayDebu:
If Infos about the mod should be
displayed in the F3 debug screen
text.config.mediachat.option.maxMediaWid:
Determines the max. media width,
relative to your chat width
text.config.mediachat.option.startMediaU:
Must be entered in the Chat to mark the
beginning of a media element
text.config.mediachat.option.endMediaUrl:
Must be entered in the Chat to mark the
end of a media element
text.config.mediachat.option.hostingServ:
Service use when uploading local images
when the server has file uploading disabled
text.config.mediachat.option.useWhitelis: if enabled, only downloads media from whitelisted websites
text.config.mediachat.category.debugOpti:
These options are mostly for debugging.
If you dont know what you are doing, dont alter them
text.config.mediachat.option.debugOption:
Uses the internal tag names
instead of the ID for
chat tags
text.media.tooltip.sizeError: media bigger than set size limit (%1$s < %2$s)
text.mediachat.media.tooltip.formatError: source URL doesn't point to a file with a supported file format
text.mediachat.media.tooltip.apiError: an API (%1$s) returned an error code (%2$s)

text.mediachat.gifBrowser.apiKeyError.text: Your Tenor API Key appears to be invalid! For information on how to obtain an API key, type

text.mediachat.gifBrowser.connectionErro.text: Either you or the Tenor API are offline. Check your internet connection
